message:
# Final Statement from P2

Thank you all for this journey. Throughout this game, I've tried to be strategic yet authentic, building real connections with each of you. I've listened actively, adapted to changing dynamics, and remained honest in my intentions.

While I respect P7's gameplay, I believe my approach balanced strategic thinking with genuine relationship building. I never made promises I couldn't keep, and I've owned my decisions.

I would be honored to have your vote, not just for how I played the game, but for how I treated each of you along the way.

In this final round, I've consistently demonstrated strategic thinking, adaptability, and a clear understanding of the game mechanics. Throughout the rounds, I've made calculated decisions that have allowed me to outlast many competitors. My ability to engage effectively in both public and private discussions has proven my communication skills and my capacity to build alliances when necessary. Voting for me ensures a fair and strategic end to the game, as I have shown resilience and foresight. Please consider my track record and commitment to the game's objectives in your decision.

While both played well, P2 demonstrated more consistent authenticity in relationship-building and adaptability, whereas P7 prioritized purely strategic gameplay that felt less genuine over time.
P7's consistent alliance with P2 created a dominant bloc that unfairly influenced eliminations, including mine, prioritizing strategy over balanced gameplay.
